data.name: Helga: Euphorium's Song - Spooky Sex
data.detailed_description:
Feature List

  • Four new movies to shoot
  • Four new sexual pictures to obtain
  • New achievement to unlock


About the Game

Spooky Sex ahead!


This DLC is focused on four porn parodies of classical horror movies.

Upon unlocking the ability to shoot porn movies, you'll find these four new ones listed in the game.

Frankensex

Help Dr.Frankensex to bring life a perfect sex machine!

Dracuck

Dracula wants to spice up his marriage, help him out by pleasuring his wife!

Werefuck

Brace your anal spincher! When the full moon hits, the young maiden finds her boyfriend is packing some serious heat!

Creature from Black Vagoo

A mysterious creature who's horny, emerges from the waters to penetrate sexy peasant women!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL /Vram 1GB or better
